resources.string: If you find a problem, tell us
If you\'ve done it, you drink.
Guess if the card is higher or lower.
Different rounds with phrases and random events.
Surprise events! Add players to unlock them.
We hope you had a blast!
Follow the instructions on each card.
Random events appear every few rounds.
Complete the challenge or drink 2 extra sips.
Fast! If you fail, drink 2 sips.
Do you dare? If not, drink 2 sips.
If MAN wins, women drink. If WOMAN wins, men drink.
Say it fast. Fail: 2 shots. Success: Give 3.
Stare. First to blink or laugh: DRINKS.
First one to raise their hand gets something special...
Take the pic. The photographer chooses who drinks.
Show off! If you don\'t dance, drink 2.
On 3, point at someone. Most pointed drinks.
Count to 3 and look up. Eye contact? BOTH DRINK!
Others guess. If no one guesses in 30s, YOU DRINK.
Create a rule. E.g., No one can say \'YES\' or \'NO\'.
Whoever wants a GIFT raise your hand NOW!
SAVED! Joker card to skip a challenge.
The girls who order sushi just for the IG Notes: BOTTOMS UP!
Last one to touch the floor: DRINK
Show last photo in gallery (No explaining)
Hug round: Hug person to your left
The oldest: CHOOSES TWO to do a SHOT CROSS
Whoever has the most siblings: DRINK
The person with the closest birthday: 1 SHOT
Whoever came in their own vehicle: DRINK
Last person to raise their hand: 2 SHOTS
The person with the oldest phone: DRINK
One sip for everyone who is sitting
The last person to stand up: CHOOSES WHO DRINKS
-20 years old: 1 shot. +20 years old: 2 shots
The youngest chooses 2 people for a shot cross
The tallest and the shortest person: SHOT CROSS
People with dark hair: 1 sip. Dyed hair: 2 sips
If there is someone with green or blue eyes: DRINK
Whoever has the smallest foot: DRINK
Drinkers: Leo, Capricorn, Cancer, and Gemini
Drinkers: Aquarius, Taurus, Aries, and Libra
The person with the longest name: DRINK
Those who fall in love quickly: DRINK
If you get angry easily: SIP
Sagittarius: SHOT for talking too much
If you got back with your ex: DRINK
If you ve ever snuck out: DRINK
If you would kiss someone here: DRINK
If you prefer being married over single: SHOT
If you kissed someone out of pity: SHOT
If you have a fake Instagram for stalking: SHOT
If you used Dating Apps: LONG SIP
If you had an erotic dream with someone present: DRINK
If you got caught in the act: DRINK
If you have read receipts turned off: DRINK
The person with the most IG followers: SHOT
If you like kisses with biting: SHOT
If you ve fantasized about a teacher/boss: SHOT
If you secretly checked someones phone: SHOT
If your phone has been checked: SIP
Vote for the biggest spender: SHOT
Point to the quietest one: TAKE A SHOT
Vote for the biggest party animal: DRINK
Vote for the least party animal: DRINK
Vote for the most shameless: DRINK
Vote for the most embarrassing: DRINK
Vote for the most extroverted: DRINK
Vote for the Otaku of the group: DRINK
Vote for the biggest Gamer: DRINK
VOTE! The most pointed-at person chugs
The person who suggested playing chooses 3 to drink
The oldest person chooses 2 to give a peck
The person who arrived earliest chooses 2 for a peck
The person who arrived latest: DRINK
The person hosting chooses 2 to drink
Everyone be serious: The first person to laugh DRINKS
Count to 10: The person who says 10 DRINKS
The person with the most battery chooses 2
Every woman chooses 1 person to drink
Men massage women for 1 min (or shot)
Women massage men for 1 min (or shot)
The last person to touch their nose: DRINK
If you are wearing red underwear: SHOT
Swap a piece of clothing with the person to your right or DRINK
Whoever cooks best: Chooses who drinks
Whoever has the biggest foot: DRINK
If you have traveled to another continent: SAVED. Everyone else drinks.
The person with the most coins in their pocket: DRINK
If you have a pet: DRINK
The person who speaks the most languages: Distributes 2 sips
If you ride a motorcycle: DRINK
Say 3 truths and 1 lie about yourselves
CONFESSION: How old were you for your first time?
CONFESSION: The weirdest place you ve done it?
CONFESSION: What is the first thing you look at in someone?
SWAP PLACES! Everyone switch places with anyone
Thumb War with the person to your right
The person with the biggest foot chooses the next song
Try to touch your nose with your tongue.
Point to who you think would be the best president
Give a 1 min shoulder massage to the person on your right
The last person to touch something GREEN loses
The person with the lowest battery must show their last Google search
Who do you dislike in this room?
What is your biggest irrational fear?
What is the most embarrassing thing you\'ve Googled?
Have you ever lied about your age?
Who here would you kiss if you had to?
Have you snooped on someone\'s phone?
What is the biggest lie you\'ve ever told?
Have you faked being sick to avoid something?
What is the most embarrassing thing that happened on a date?
Who is your current secret crush?
Have you cheated on an exam?
What is your biggest physical insecurity?
Have you cried over someone in this group?
What is the worst gift you\'ve received?
Have you stalked someone on social media?
What is the worst thing you\'ve done while drunk?
Let the group text anyone from your phone.
Imitate someone in the group until they guess who it is.
Take a drink without using your hands.
Speak in a foreign accent for the next 3 rounds.
Let someone scroll through your photo gallery for 1 minute.
Eat a mystery mix decided by the group.
Call a random contact and sing a song.
Exchange one item of clothing with someone.
Confess your last Google search out loud.
Let someone do your makeup or hair.
Hold an ice cube in your mouth until it melts.
Imitate your favorite animal for 1 minute.
Let someone post a story on your Instagram.
Give a compliment to everyone in the group.
Act as a waiter and serve everyone for 10 minutes.
Lick the neck of the person to your right.
Tell a joke. If no one laughs, drink double.
Speak only in third person until your next turn.
Let someone tickle you for 30 seconds without laughing.
Do an embarrassing photoshoot directed by the group.
Walk on all fours until your next turn.
Everyone drinks until the player who drew stops.
Last one to put thumb on table drinks.
Last one to raise hand drinks.
Say a word, everyone rhymes. Fail = Drink.
Pick a category. Fail to name one = Drink.
Ask questions. Answerer must reply with a question.
1st King: Choose WHAT goes in the cup.\nMix the central drink.
2nd King: Choose WHERE to drink.\nE.g., On the table, under the table...
3rd King: Choose HOW to drink.\nE.g., No hands, upside down...
4th King: BAD LUCK!\nYou must drink the entire cup following previous rules.
Everyone drinks until the drawer stops.
Place thumb on table. Last one drinks.
Pick a mate. They drink when you drink.
Say a word. Everyone rhymes. Fail/Repeat = Drink.
E.g., Car brands. Blanking out = Drink.
Invent a rule (e.g., drink with left hand).
Ask questions. Must answer with a question.
1st King: Choose WHAT goes in the cup.
4th King: Drink the cup following all rules.
No pressure. Think calmly and answer when ready.
Tic-Toc! Answer fast or the bomb explodes in your hands.
Name items in the category in order
Name an item from the category

string-array.name: never_questions_list
string-array.item: Never have I ever been arrested.
Never have I ever kissed someone in this room.
Never have I ever been in an open relationship.
Never have I ever lied to get out of work/school.
Never have I ever snooped through my partner\'s phone.
Never have I ever had sex in a public place.
Never have I ever used a dating app.
Never have I ever had a sex dream about someone here.
Never have I ever thrown up from drinking too much.
Never have I ever sent a nude.
Never have I ever had a friend with benefits.
Never have I ever faked an orgasm.
Never have I ever stalked an ex on social media.
Never have I ever had a threesome.
Never have I ever driven drunk.
Never have I ever been on a blind date.
Never have I ever forgotten someone\'s name during sex.
Never have I ever cheated on a partner.
Never have I ever gone skinny dipping.
Never have I ever had sex in a car.
Never have I ever lied in this game.
Never have I ever sent a drunk text I regretted.
Never have I ever kissed more than one person in a night.
Never have I ever had sex on a beach.
Never have I ever been kicked out of a bar/club.
Never have I ever fantasized about a teacher.
Never have I ever used sex toys.
Never have I ever ghosted someone.
Never have I ever flirted with a cop to avoid a ticket.

resources.string:
‚Ä¢ Everyone gets a secret word
‚Ä¢ Except the impostor who knows nothing
‚Ä¢ Give clues without revealing the word
‚Ä¢ The impostor must fake it
‚Ä¢ Vote for who the impostor is
You don\'t know the word\nFake it!

‚Ä¢ Take turns giving clues
‚Ä¢ Don't say the word directly
‚Ä¢ The impostor must blend in
‚Ä¢ Watch out for suspicious behavior
Is the next one Higher or Lower?

‚Ä¢ Act without speaking
‚Ä¢ Your team must guess
‚Ä¢ Every word counts
‚Ä¢ Don't use your hands wrong!
This app is a game for entertainment purposes only.
‚Ä¢ You must be of legal drinking age in your country.
‚Ä¢ Kampai does not promote alcohol abuse.
Play responsibly and take care of your friends.
I accept and I am of legal age
On the count of 3, point at...
Everyone points at someone at the same time

string-array.name: likely_questions_list
string-array.item: ...get naked if they drink too much.
...get into a fight with a bouncer.
...pretend to be sober and fail miserably.
...cry in the middle of the party.
...end up on the news for something stupid.
...spend their whole paycheck in one night.

Touch each other and feel the rhythm.
